messages.message: Hey Team, I have request from two customers on bundling external python libs to our images as they might need to use them via UDF for custom purpose? Do we have any write up on how and what to follow? Are we maintaining these(it may grow cumbersome for us to maintain)? How will upgrade in such scenario work? Who should be responsible for re-bundling of those libs again? Any guidelines

Hey @vp we have used this in the past to tell customers to extend instabaseâ€™s images with the libraries they need: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pp46YOsneATzkbCwVDZkv71QDmpAVw_D/view?usp=sharing

In my opinion this became fairly unmanageable.   @Kerry do you have any thoughts here?
